db:abstract.db:para: The QPageRanges class represents a collection of page ranges.
This class was introduced in Qt 6.0.

db:listitem.db:para: QPageRanges is part of Painting Classesprintingshared

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: Use QPagedPaintDevice::pageRanges() to access the collection of page ranges associated with a paged device.

db:section.db:title: QPageRanges::QPageRanges()
db:section.db:para: Constructs an empty QPageRanges object.

db:section.db:title: [noexcept] QPageRanges::QPageRanges(const QPageRanges &other)
db:section.db:para: Constructs a QPageRanges object by copying other.

db:section.db:title: [noexcept] QPageRanges::QPageRanges(QPageRanges &&other)
db:section.db:para: Constructs a QPageRanges object by moving from other.

db:section.db:title: [noexcept] QPageRanges::~QPageRanges()
db:section.db:para: Destroys the page ranges.

db:section.db:title: void QPageRanges::addPage(int pageNumber)
db:section.db:para: Adds the single page pageNumber to the ranges.

db:note.db:para: Page numbers start with 1. Attempts to add page numbers smaller than 1 will be ignored with a warning.

db:section.db:title: void QPageRanges::addRange(int from, int to)
db:section.db:para: Adds the range specified with from and to to the ranges.

db:note.db:para: Page numbers start with 1. Attempts to add page numbers smaller than 1 will be ignored with a warning.

db:section.db:title: void QPageRanges::clear()
db:section.db:para: Removes all page ranges.

db:section.db:title: bool QPageRanges::contains(int pageNumber) const
db:section.db:para: Returns true if the ranges include the page pageNumber; otherwise returns false.

db:section.db:title: int QPageRanges::firstPage() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the index of the first page covered by the page ranges, or 0 if the page ranges are empty.

db:section.db:title: [static] QPageRanges QPageRanges::fromString(const QString &ranges)
db:section.db:para: Constructs and returns a QPageRanges object populated with the ranges from the string representation.
In case of parsing error, returns an empty QPageRanges object.

db:section.db:title: bool QPageRanges::isEmpty() const
db:section.db:para: Returns true if the ranges are empty; otherwise returns false.

db:section.db:title: int QPageRanges::lastPage() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the index of the last page covered by the page ranges, or 0 if the page ranges are empty.

db:section.db:title: QList<QPageRanges::Range> QPageRanges::toRangeList() const
db:section.db:para: Returns a list with the values of the ranges.

db:section.db:title: QString QPageRanges::toString() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the string representation of the page ranges.

db:section.db:title: [noexcept] QPageRanges &QPageRanges::operator=(QPageRanges &&other)
db:section.db:para: Moves other into this QPageRanges object.

db:section.db:title: [noexcept] QPageRanges &QPageRanges::operator=(const QPageRanges &other)
db:section.db:para: Assigns other to this QPageRanges object.

db:section.db:title: QDataStream &operator<<(QDataStream &stream, const QPageRanges &pageRanges)
db:section.db:para: Writes pageRanges to stream as a range string.

db:section.db:title: QDataStream &operator>>(QDataStream &stream, QPageRanges &pageRanges)
db:section.db:para: Reads a page ranges string from stream and stores it in pageRanges.
